content:
Subject: Question about Project Status

Dear client@external.com,

Thank you for reaching out to inquire about the current status of the Q1 project deliverables. I appreciate your interest in staying updated on our progress.

To address your question, I am pleased to inform you that our team is working diligently to meet the project milestones. Below are the current project status updates:

* We are on track to complete the project scope by the end of Q1, as per the agreed-upon timeline.
* Our team is actively working on the deliverables, and we anticipate completing them within the next two weeks.
* We will provide a comprehensive project report, including all deliverables, by the end of Q1.

If you have any further questions or would like to schedule a meeting to discuss the project in more detail, please do not hesitate to reach out. We appreciate your continued support and look forward to delivering a successful project.

Best regards,
pm@company.com
